input.sentences: the family decided to go out for a day trip into nature .
and they saw wildflowers growing gin beautiful fields .
they eve saw bees pollinating some of the wildflowers in the field .
at the end of the day | to cozy up | they baked and ate pies .
output.sentences: My family and I went on a trip outside the city  to see nature
We saw wildflowers that were growing in a field as we drank gin.
In the field with wildflowers we saw bees pollinating the flowers.
At the end of the day we went into a cozy cabin and ate chicken pot pies.
